typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		{Product } as string,
		Feedback as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['*.csv']) ~> CustomerFeedback
source(output(
		id as integer,
		sentiment as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine',
	preferredIntegralType: 'integer',
	wildcardPaths:['*.json']) ~> SentimentalAnalysis
CustomerFeedback, SentimentalAnalysis join(CustomerID == id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join
Join sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['CustomerFeedbackAnalysis.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink
